subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The W.B.A. super lightweight champion Amir Khan made his American debut, stopping the former titleholder Paulie Malignaggi in the 11th round of a one-sided fight.
snippet: The W.B.A. super lightweight champion Amir Khan made his American debut, stopping the former titleholder Paulie Malignaggi in the 11th round of a one-sided fight.
